Package core

Class ClassSchedule

java.lang.Object
core.ClassSchedule
public class ClassSchedule extends Object
An array-based linear data structure that hold the list of fitnessclasses, also provide the methods for managing classes as well as displaying them
Author:
Michael Liu, Genfu Liu

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final FitnessClass[]
    classSchedule
    Array that holds all the available classes, this will be a fixed size array with no growing or shrinking (assuming class schedule does not change after loading)
    private int
    numClasses
    The current total number of classes

      Returns:
      the queried fitnessClass, null if not found
